channel.title: some settings not saving/resetting
channel.description: If i turn on God Rays for example and leave the game, it switches back to off once i start it again, cloud steam sync is enabled. Also lot's of textures in the game look very low res, I'm not sure if it's my issue or if that's just the way it is and I just didn't notice before.

item.title: some settings not saving/resetting
item.dc:creator: Dotard
item.description:
If i turn on God Rays for example and leave the game, it switches back to off once i start it again, cloud steam sync is enabled.
Also lot’s of textures in the game look very low res, I’m not sure if it’s my issue or if that’s just the way it is and I just didn’t notice before.

Read full topic
